location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges the receipt of William Newnham's letter of 11 March 1813, which informed William Bruce that George Brown had been given permission by the East India Company to visit the country situated on the east of the Caspean [Caspian] Sea.
